model Order {
    fields {
        items Item[]
        promoCode Text
        externalId ID
    }
    operations {
        list listOrders(items.price, code:     Text) {
            @where(order.promoCode == code)
        }

        create createOrder() with(externalId: ID, promoCode) {
            @set(order.externalId = externalId)
        }
    }
}

model Item {
    fields {
        price Number
        order Order
    }
}
